item.description:
We'll be meeting at the same place in Scarborough and this time it's on a Wed. night.  For those of you who can't make it we'll meet on a Monday in Oct. Bring your positive vibes to create lots of energy and lively discussions. Look forward to seeing whom ever can make it!

There will be a slight charge to cover costs of the group :)

 

See you then!

 

Cheers,

 

Caryn
item.how_to_find_us: If you're new I'll send you address when you sign up for event!
item.name: Let's revisit a movie and continue our inspiring discussions!
